page.title: 11ROADS IN LOSSIEMOUTH AREA
page.content: There are three major and secondary roads in this area, the A941, the B9135 and the B9103. The A941 goes to Elgin, the B9135 runs past the RAF camp and then joins the A941, and the B9135 joins the main road to Aberdeen. The busiest road with traffic leaving Lossiemouth is the A941 because of the shops in Elgin and because many people work there. The B9135 is quite busy because of people going in and out of the RAF camp to work. The B9103 is least busy. There is only one bus service from Lossiemouth, running to Elgin. Buses run every quarter or half hour, depending on the day and time of day, but on Sundays they run every two hours.
